quotes: He led the research program at what many believe to be the world's best policy research center on global-scale environment and development concerns--the World Resources Institute.
Growing up in Egypt, Mohamed El-Ashry (MS, '63, PhD, '66, geology) cultivated a passion for geology following dramatic discoveries of oil in the Gulf of Suez and along the Red Sea.
